content-descriptors.description: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB
content-descriptors.name: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

attributes.long-description:
Strap into the cockpit of the Cobra – the most powerful tank ever built – and experience first-person tank combat across neon-scarred sci-fi landscapes in an explosive campaign for 1-4 players.
Now you can conquer the battlefield on PS4 with or without a VR device with the Battlezone Gold Edition, which includes all skin, bobblehead, and horn content packs!
FULLY PLAYABLE IN PLAYSTATION®VR – For the ultimate Battlezone experience, strap in using your PlayStation®VR headset to gain true battlefield awareness, a monumental sense of scale and breathless combat intensity.
LIMITLESS SOLO & CO-OP PLAY – Experience a thrilling campaign for 1-4 players where different environments, enemies and missions blend together across a procedurally generated campaign. No two playthroughs will be the same!
DEVASTATING ARSENAL – Unleash destructive weapons and awesome special equipment, from laser-guided missiles and artillery to EMPs and shield boosts.



1 player
Network Players 2-4
15GB minimum save size
DUALSHOCK®4
PlayStation®VR Compatible
PlayStation®Camera Compatible

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online features require an account and are subject to terms of service and applicable privacy policy (playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service & playstationnetwork.com/privacy-policy). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

©2016 Rebellion. The Rebellion name and logo and the Battlezone name and logo are trademarks of Rebellion and may be registered trademarks in certain countries. All rights reserved.FULLY PLAYABLE IN PLAYSTATION®VR – For the ultimate Battlezone experience, strap in using your PlayStation®VR headset to gain true battlefield awareness, a monumental sense of scale and breathless combat intensity.
attributes.name: Battlezone Gold Edition
